ar.com.hjg.pngj.chunks

Class PngChunkTRNS

  • java.lang.Object
    • ar.com.hjg.pngj.chunks.PngChunk
      • ar.com.hjg.pngj.chunks.PngChunkSingle
        • ar.com.hjg.pngj.chunks.PngChunkTRNS

  • public class PngChunkTRNS
extends PngChunkSingle
    tRNS chunk.

    see http://www.w3.org/TR/PNG/#11tRNS

    this chunk structure depends on the image type

        public void setEntryPalAlpha(int idx,

        Sets the length of the palette alpha. This should be followed by #setNentriesPalAlpha
        Parameters:

        val - alpha value (0-255)
